name: Kirby's Dream Collection
description:
Kirby's Dream Collection is a platformer game developed by HAL Laboratory. It was originally released in 2012. Nintendo published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Kirby's Dream Collection on Wii.
It was produced by Hiroaki Suga, Kensuke Tanabe and Yoichi Yamamoto. Shinya Kumazaki and Tatsuya Kamiyama directed the game. Hirokazu Ando, Jun Ishikawa and Shogo Sakai scored the game.
